title: Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 brings back the vibration icon in status bar
content:
While Android 12 brought many exciting changes to the table, it also made a few questionable decisions, like removing the vibration icon from the status bar. The change didnâ€™t sit well with many users. Android 13 Beta 1 signaled that Google was working on reverting this change and would add a dedicated toggle to let

The post Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 brings back the vibration icon in status bar appeared first on XDA.
description: Android QRP3 Beta 3 brings back the ability to display the vibration icon in the status bar. Read on to know more.
